stories.text:
I get asked this question by almost all business buyers, "Why is the business for sale?"

Besides retirement, sickness, divorce and other serious life situations, why else would someone sell a growing and profitable technology business?

btw, I'm a business broker and am doing some market research with this question.
stories.title: Selling a Successful SaaS business, reasons?
Lotus announces 4 new electric vehicles, including 2 SUVs
Wildfire Smoke Impacts on Indoor Air Quality Assessed in California

stories.text:
I'm currently working on a project to streamline the process for getting non-crypto users access to defi interest rates on their cash.

I know HN isn't really my target market, given everyone here is tech savvy and could manager their own keys (not to mention HN isn't exactly pro-crypto). But, if any of your non-technical friends would be interested, feel free to forward this on to them. I'm also receptive to feedback on the idea itself.

Sign up below if you want early access to the beta. https://mailchi.mp/7c1622b25846/zenfinance
stories.title: Ask HN: Would you use DeFi if you didn't have to use pub/priv keys?
